titleStmt.title: His Highnesse the Lord Protector's speeches to the Parliament in the painted chamber, the one on Munday the 4th of September; the other on Tuesday the 12. of September. 1654. Taken by one who stood very near him, and published to prevent mistakes.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)

titleStmt.title: His Highnesse the Lord Protector's speeches to the Parliament in the painted chamber, the one on Munday the 4th of September; the other on Tuesday the 12. of September. 1654. Taken by one who stood very near him, and published to prevent mistakes.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for G. Sawbridge at the Bible on Ludgate-hill,

notesStmt.note: In two parts. Part 2, His Highnesse the Lord Protector's speech to the Parliament in the painted chamber, on Tuesday the 12th of September. 1654, has separate dated title page, pagination and register. Part 2 is identified as Thomason E.812[11*], and = Wing (2nd ed., 1994) C7170D. Also issued separately?
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
